column1: Huinan County (simplified Chinese: 辉南县; traditional Chinese: 輝南縣; pinyin: Huīnán Xiàn) is a county of southwestern Jilin province
column2: China. It is under the administration of Tonghua City

column1: There are 10 towns and one ethnic township.Towns:

column10: Tuanlin (团林镇)The only township is Loujie Korean Ethnic Township (楼街朝鲜族乡)
